author: Alex Ross
comment: I've had many watch face making apps and watch faces, but this face gets me the most compliments and the best look for no cost. I love this watch face.

author: R. Whitby Jarvis
comment: This watchface is why I bought a smart watch.  Charming.

author: Harry Botts
comment: Use to work on my lg watch but now it does not have tried everything. Works on lg phone. But will not download to lg ware.

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: Please reboot your Watch. Put it on power charger and leave it charging. Reboot your phone and reinstall the app. This is a known bug with Android Wear 1.x. Please report back if this worked. Problem is on Google, not my app.

author: Raymond Jensen
comment: The new frame looks nice.

author: joseph munchel
comment: Thanks to a quick response from the developer, was finally able to get it working. I love the look of the face, but not sure about the simple sleep face, I mean, REALLY minimalistic. Maybe it'll grow on me. Otherwise great developer customer support!

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: Please reboot your Android Wear smartwatch. And you can use Play Store on your watch to install the watch face.

author: Brian Murphy
comment: Absolutely gorgeous watch face.  I love really complex, high-tech faces, but have an equal love for the traditional. This one makes you feel like you have an old, rare watch on your wrist.

author: Susan Glick
comment: What happened to the date? This would be the perfect face if the date were still there and showed up when the screen went to sleep.

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: To prevent burn-in issues on OLED screens there should be only moving hands in ambient mode, and no fixed elements.

author: Mark Lucock
comment: On my  Moto 360 gen one , great, just make sure you reboot the watch when installed. Fantastic support from the maker on a minor issues that they dealt with fast. Thank you! Oh fantastic face 😀

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: Please check battery stats in Android Wear companion app who drinks your battery juice. I also have Moto 360.1 and battery usage is minimal. Try to reboot your watch and see if it persists.

title: Very good indeed

author: Joseph Daniel
comment: Good watch face (hoping for other designs as well please) & great job on the very simple and elegant arms showing the clock with all dark background
title: Best & most elegant screen saver watch

author: Gary Macabeo
comment: Tried out a lot of different watchfaces-- this is the one I keep returning to.  Looks great on my LG Watch Urbane...even when it switches to all black with white hands.

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: Cool watch, I'm already working on "New Era" 2.0 complications support. Sadly my old Moto 360 will never get Wear 2.0.

author: Nicole Poxon
comment: Nice face but doesn't look as good on a square watch, as the shape doesn't adjust

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: That's because it uses a photo of a real watch face and cannot be easily adjusted for square watches.

title: Not for squares

author: karen s
comment: Looks fab on my huawei watch, had lots of compliments!

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: Good to hear my app brings fun into your world :)

title: Authentic looking

author: Jonas Örnbäck
comment: Doednt work, doesnt show up in the list, no app icons either, nothing

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: This is for Android Wear smartwatch. Do you have one? This is not a normal app for smartphone.

author: Camo Royal
comment: Simple, Elegant and great on battery life.
title: Great looking watch face

author: Tony Hinds
comment: beautiful watch face, looks amazing on my Tic watch 2.

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: Is Ticwatch compatible with Android Wear apps out of the box?

author: Maksim Tautkin
comment: Very nice watch face. Everything works fine

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: Please reboot your watch. This app has thousands of users, everything works fine. Cheers!

author: Trina B.
comment: Great design, low battery use.

author: Kurt Kramer
comment: Works
title: Old

author: Mb Abedpour
comment: Looks good and has functionality

author: Dr.Abdullah Ghazi
comment: Nice old face

author: rahib soomro
comment: lush
title: i like

author: Jose Orozco
comment: Nice smooth

author: armando hernandez
comment: Weak

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: You need Android Wear smartwatch for this app.

author: Cω Tham
comment: Used to drain badly on my watch (among all other watch faces), probably due to Ambient Mode being stuck on dimmed watch face display sans animation instead of the true power saving Ambient Mode display.  Reset watch and reset phone, everything is working fine now. Might just be an Android quirk. This watch face is nicely done for classic lovers.

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: Please check Battery Usage Stats in Android Wear app. I can't believe that. Do you already have Marshmallow 6.0 firmware update on you watch? So your watch never charges until 100% no matter what watch face?

author: James Walker
comment: A friend said they thought it looked beautiful, and I have to agree with them! My only gripe is that the second hand snaps back to its previous location at the speed of light. I know its supposed to be the battery life, but its a little weird that it breaks the laws of physics.

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: Last week I posted a new version with normal seconds hand. Maybe try to clear the cache of your Google Play Store app, then you should see it. Tell me if the new version works for you. Thanks for good rating :)

title: Really nice!

author: Mark Mynhier
comment: If you READ his description of the app, it behaves exactly as he says it does. Brilliant in the execution!
title: Does exactly what it says

author: Marcus Muehlbauer
comment: The fact that seconds don't work is sort of cool if it was supposed to be that way.

reply.author: Ulrich Schonhardt
reply.content: The tiny hand is the animated battery level: 60 means full, counting down anti-clockwise. So 30 means battery is half full :) Thanks for 5 stars!

title: Seconds don't work (start every 5 sec from same spot)

author: Brallan Dublan
comment: Great watch face :)

author: Steve Marsh
comment: Square face version would be nice.
title: Neat

author: T Aquinas
comment: But it would be nice to have something extra in the corners for square watch faces. Otherwise it just looks out of place.
title: Nice design...
